Rulings.Base:
1. This card does not target.
2. You cannot activate this card if you control no face-up "Watt" monsters.
3. This effect does not apply to "Watt" monsters Summoned after it resolves.
4. If a monster affected by "Wattkey" is flipped face-down, it is no longer affected by it even if it flips face-up again that turn.
